subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets used their two first-round picks on Ike Davis a first baseman from Arizona State, and Reese Havens, a shortstop from South Carolina — both power hitters.
snippet: The Mets used their two first-round picks on Ike Davis a first baseman from Arizona State, and Reese Havens, a shortstop from South Carolina — both power hitters.
